comment: The sweetest teacher ever! She was such a delight and has a real passion for music. Even if you have no experience with music she will make you understand and you will love every minute of it! I looked forward to this class everyday!!! Happy Retirement Professor Hammond!
She made the class fun, but the expectations were not so clear most of the time. She is there 100% if you need help, too!
The sweetest lady in the world.  She will work with you if you have trouble completing assignments.  Excellent person to talk to when you need someone.
VERY fair, patient, and fun professor.  Loves what she does, and loves to help others.

Excellent teacher!  One of the kindest, fairest, & encouraging teachers I've ever had the luck to make me work my tail off!  Never a dull moment, leads class thru various teaching methods & exercises.  She expects a lot, but in the end, you feel inspired. Class for future music teachers, so don't understand the rating comment of previous rater. ???
Prepares you to teach, wonderful job

I took this class as an Education course- she expects EVERYONE to be a music major.  Her expectations are very high, her work load is huge, and she makes you sing alone in front of your peers.  Then she'll critcize you in front of everyone.
